data.name: The Legend of Heroes: Sen no Kiseki IV - Altina's Millium Orion Costume
data.detailed_description:
Change Altina's outfit to the original Miriam's Secret Service Uniform costume.

Contents:
Miriam' Secret Service Uniform x1, Miriam's Secret Service Hat x1

*After obtaining these items, they can be equipped from the Costume page on the Camp Menu.
data.about_the_game:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-3220
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
